item.description:
It's Christmas! Let's go to the movies.

The trailer for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo is set to the music of Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross, and it is worth checking out the movie's trailer at the theater website. The film editing is perfectly matched to the beat of the music. Reznor and Ross wrote the movie score, and I am looking forward to hearing the score as much as I am looking forward to seeing the movie.

I will purchase my ticket at around 6:50 p.m., then wait in the theater lobby between 6:50 and 7:00 p.m. Look for me and my red backpack. At about 7:00, I will move into the theater auditorium. You can find me there if you are late. The movie starts at 7:20 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone. Look for the red backpack.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event so I know who to look for.

Marianne
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red backpack. See the event description for more details.
item.name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
